```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(httr)
library(distill)
library(lubridate)
library(dbplyr)
library(janitor)
library(skimr)
library(jsonlite)
```
```{r read}

x<-read_csv("archive.zip") #male shoes
y<-read_csv("7210_1.csv.zip") #female shoes
```
 
```{r cleaning}
#Cleaning up x

x %>% 
  select(brand,dateadded,prices_amountmin,prices_amountmax,prices_currency,prices_issale) %>% 
  mutate(gender="men")
```


```{r cleaning}
#Cleaning up y

y %>% 
  select(brand,dateAdded,prices.amountMin,prices.amountMax,prices.currency,prices.isSale) %>% 
  mutate(gender="women") %>% 
  #rename(prices_amountmin="prices.amountMin",prices_amountmax="prices.amountMax",prices_currency="prices.currency",prices_issale="prices.isSale")
  ggplot(mapping=aes(x=prices.amountMax,y=dateAdded,color=prices.isSale))+
  geom_point()

#full_join(x,y,by=NULL,copy=FALSE)
  

```
